text: Roy R. Romer (born October 31, 1928) is an American politician. He was the 39th Governor of Colorado. He also served as the superintendent of the Los Angeles Unified School District from 2001 to 2006. His son is Nobel Prize winner Paul Romer. He was born in Garden City, Kansas. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:Living people Category:Governors of Colorado Category:Politicians from Kansas Category:Politicians from California Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Roy Romer
